title: 1 Minute Blender Mint Hot Chocolate
directions: Blend until smooth (between 10 seconds and 1 minute for most blenders) This will make a hot chocolate usually safe enough for kids to drink (but still test it first)
Keep blending it until it reaches your desired temperature
ingredients: 1/4 cup Raw Honey or Maple Syrup (vegan option) to taste
1/4 cup unsweetened Cocoa Powder/ Cacao Powder or Carob Powder (Caffeine free)
